item.title: BandwagonHost VPS Guide
item.description: A virtual private server (VPS) is a virtual machine sold as a service by an Internet hosting service. The virtual dedicated server (VDS) also has a similar meaning(More Information refers to Wikipedia).

item.title: VM Installation
item.description: This posts is devote to the installation of virtual machine.
